general_info.summary: The provided text lists various departments, services, and initiatives at Sharda University, covering areas such as recruitment, banking, leadership, history, student support services like counseling and accommodation, skill development, innovation, and specific programs like FM radio and mentoring. It also includes information on COVID-19, visa guidelines, and links to external resources like the National Cyber Crime Reporting Portal.
